org.soulwing.prospecto.api

Interface ViewTemplate


  • public interface ViewTemplate
    A view template.

    A template can be used to generate a view from a model and to apply a view to update a model.

    A template is produced using a ViewTemplateBuilder. Once a template is created it is effectively immutable (i.e. stateless) and therefore thread safe.

    The template construction process uses reflection and is thus relatively expensive. For this reason, templates should be constructed once and then used many times to generate views and to create applicators.

    Author:
    Carl Harris

      A traversal for a ViewTemplate.

      • depthFirst

      • generateView

        View generateView(Object model,
                ViewContext context)
        Generates a view using the given model as the root object represented by the view.

        The model's type must correspond to the root type specified for the template. If model must be evaluated in particular context (e.g. while a database transaction remains in progress, or while a JPA entity manager remains open), the caller must ensure that the required context is in place.

        Parameters:
        model - root model object
        context - view context
        Returns:
        view whose event stream can be used to produce a textual representation of model

      • createApplicator

        ViewApplicator createApplicator(View source,
                              ViewContext context)
        Creates a view applicator using the given source view.

        The given view is assumed not to have an outer envelope.

        Parameters:
        source - source view (typically produced by a ViewReader
        context - view context
        Returns:
        model editor

      • createApplicator

        ViewApplicator createApplicator(View source,
                              ViewContext context,
                              String dataKey)
        Creates a view applicator using the given enveloped source view.
        Parameters:
        source - source view (typically produced by a ViewReader
        context - view context
        dataKey - envelope key that contains the editable view data
        Returns:
        model editor
